DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a mobile sensing platform can passively and objectively detect the presence of clinically significant mood disorder symptomatology and symptom progression over time. Meeting this goal will allow for improved risk categorization, prediction of relapse, and measurement of disease progression in a lifetime prevalence population.
DOC.brief_title: Quantified Mobile Sensing for Improving Diagnosis and Measuring Disease Progression
DOC.criteria: Age 18 or older Have a smartphone and cell service plan, including voice and data, that meets the device requirements of the Mobile Sensing Platform. Enrolled in the MoodNetwork Report positively on the QIDSSR suicide item during study intake Total score greater than 15 on the QIDSSR during the screening process
